0.1.1.en: Added support for thermostats with a thermostat_mode subset.

0.2.1.en: Adjusted compatibility to Homey Pro v12.9.0.

0.3.0.en: Stability improvements, and the Matter security code will be copied to your clipboard once clicked.

0.3.1.en: Added a hint to take a screenshot if you're on the same device.
